display-style.tooltip: Select to show graphs only, values only, or both.

cpus-to-monitor.tooltip: Select to show individual CPUs and a summary, only individuals, or only a summary

digit-type.tooltip: Display the clock speed or a percentage of the maximum clock speed.

graph-width.tooltip: Move the slider to adjust the width of individual CPU graph bars

refresh-rate.tooltip: Move the slider to adjust how often the applet updates.  Note: this can have a large impact on system performance if you set it too low

lower-border.tooltip: Percentage of CPU to define low usage

upper-border.tooltip: Percentage of CPU to define high usage

background.description: The background color for each graph bar:
background.tooltip: Click the button to select a new bar background color

low-color.description: The low level color for each graph bar:
low-color.tooltip: Click the button to select a new low level status color

med-color.description: The medium level color for each graph bar:
med-color.tooltip: Click the button to select a new medium level status color

high-color.description: The high level color for each graph bar:
high-color.tooltip: Click the button to select a new high level status color

text-color.description: The text color for the applet:
text-color.tooltip: Click the button to select a text color
